bhikkhādāyaka：bhikkhādāyaka（ti）
ဘိက္ခာဒါယက（တိ）
[bhikkhā+dāyaka．thī-nitea bhikkhādāyikā．]
[ဘိက္ခာ+ဒါယက။ ထီ-၌ ဘိက္ခာဒါယိကာ။]

Bhikkhādāyaka：Once a man of Rājagaha had just sat down to eat when he saw a monk，who had travelled far，standing outside his house．

He emptied his food into the monk’s bowl．

When he died he was reborn in Tāvatimsa in a golden palace twelve yojanas in height．Vv．vi．6; VvA．292f．

bhikkhādāyaka：ဘိက္ခာဒါယက（တိ）
[ဘိက္ခာ+ဒါယက။ ထီ-၌ ဘိက္ခာဒါယိကာ။]
ဆွမ်းလှူသော၊ သူ။
